text: "Heart-Shaped Box" is a song by the American grunge band Nirvana. It was written by lead singer and guitarist Kurt Cobain. It was released on August 23, 1993 as the first single from their third studio album In Utero. Cobain's wife Courtney Love thought the song was about her, although it was actually written about children with cancer.Cross, Charles R. Heavier than Heaven: A Biography of Kurt Cobain, p.281 == References == Category:Nirvana (band) songs Category:1993 songs
title: Heart-Shaped Box
